# Vendor Directory

This directory contains third-party libraries used by the application, vendored to ensure offline functionality and stability.

## Libraries

### Mind Elixir
- **Purpose**: Mindmap visualization library.
- **Source**: `https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/mind-elixir/dist/MindElixir.js`
- **Version**: (Latest as of download)
- **Files**:
  - `mind-elixir/MindElixir.js` (ES Module)
  - `mind-elixir/style.css` (Stylesheet)

---
*Note: This directory allows the application to run without external CDN dependencies.*
